personalInfo.clubAffl: Mayacoo Lakes CC (West Palm Beach, Florida)

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Additional Qualifying Tournament Finisher or Finished 76-100 on 2014 Web.com Tour Money List
tourBios.carHigh:
Has played the eGolf Tour.

2014: Finished T54 at the Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament in December.

2011: Played in first Web.com Tour event, missing the cut at the Miccosukee Championship in Miami...Also made his first PGA TOUR start, a missed cut at the Waste Management Phoenix Open.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Was the 1997 Okeeheelee Junior Golf Foundation Player of the Year.
tourBios.personal: Was home-schooled at the American School. Graduated in 2000...One sister, April Smith-Gonzales, is a doctor...Owned and operated an insurance agency from 2004-14...First-tee intro song would be "Enter Sandman" by Metallica...Biggest golf thrill was holing out on No. 18 at a Monday qualifier to get into a Web.com Tour event...Favorites include Florida State University and the University of Miami, the Miami Dolphins, Miami Heat and Atlanta Braves, "Sons of Anarchy," "The Departed," Garth Brooks and Hank Williams, Jr., Atlas Shrugged and The Old Man and The Sea. Is also a big fan of Dwyane Wade, Dan Marino and Tom Glavine...Best concert attended was Garth Brooks...Would like to trade places with Tiger Woods for a day. Says, "I would love to fish in my backyard."...Bucket list includes winning a PGA TOUR event and watching a World Series game in Atlanta...Motto is "Acceptance is the answer to all of my problems."...Would love to be featured in Bassmasters...Was taught by Jeff Simke, who caddied for Jack Nicklaus in 1981 and 1982...Twitter handle is bsmith0369.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T57th in 2015 at the Nova Scotia Open.
